IMUSim
Package imusim :: Package algorithms :: Module position :: Class PositionEstimator

Class PositionEstimator

source code

Base class for position estimation algorithms.

A position estimator takes data from IMUs on a jointed rigid body and updates the root position of a SampledBodyModel.

Method Details

__init__(self, model, initialTime=0, initialPosition=array([[0...)
(Constructor)

source code 

Initialise position estimator.

Parameters:
  • model - SampledBodyModel to update.
  • initialTime - The time at which the the initialPosition is sampled
  • initialPosition - Initial position vector (3x1 np.ndarray).
Overrides: object.__init__

__call__(self, data, t)
(Call operator)

source code 

Update the position of the model given the current model state and additional data.

Parameters:
  • data - Data from IMUs attached to the body , as a list of dict objects. E.g. these may be RadioPacket objects with data trasmitted by each IMU.
  • t - The time at which to compute the update (float).

getParameter(self, data, jointName, parameter, default=None)

source code 

Get a named parameter for a joint from the passed data tuple.

Parameters:
  • data - List or tuple of data objects from sensors attached to the body model. Data objects are assumed to have a 'jointName' attribute with the name of the associated joint and parameters as other named attributes e.g. 'acceleration'.
  • jointName - The joint name to get data for (string).
  • parameter - The name of the parameter to get data for (string).
  • default - Default parameter value to return if the parameter is not found in the passed data.
Returns:
The requested parameter value, or default value if the parameter is not found in the passed data.
